
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(scatterplot3d)
library(MASS)

region.anova.N15 <- aov(N15 ~ Region, data = nitrogen_data)
region.anova.per <- aov(Percent ~ Region, data = nitrogen_data)

summary(region.anova.N15)
summary(region.anova.per)

plot(region.anova.N15)
plot(region.anova.per)

summary(aov(N15 ~ Zone, data = nitrogen_data))
summary(aov(Percent ~ Zone, data = nitrogen_data))

summary(aov(N15 ~ Zone * Region, data = nitrogen_data))
TukeyHSD(aov(N15 ~ Zone * Region, data = nitrogen_data))
summary(aov(Percent ~ Zone * Region, data = nitrogen_data))
TukeyHSD(aov(Percent ~ Zone * Region, data = nitrogen_data))
```
```{r}
summary(aov(N15 ~ Genus * Region, nitrogen_data))
TukeyHSD(aov(N15 ~ Genus * Region, nitrogen_data))
summary(aov(Percent ~ Genus * Region, nitrogen_data))
TukeyHSD(aov(Percent ~ Genus * Region, nitrogen_data))
```




```{r}
##MHI Halimeda
summary(aov(N15 ~ Location + Zone + Depth, data = Halimeda.MHI))
summary(aov(Percent ~ Location + Zone + Depth, data = Halimeda.MHI))
TukeyHSD(aov(N15 ~ Location, data = Halimeda.MHI))

summary(aov(N15 ~ Location + Depth, data = Halimeda.meso.mhi))
summary(aov(N15 ~ Location + Depth, data = Halimeda.shlw.mhi))

TukeyHSD(aov(N15 ~ Location + Depth, data = Halimeda.meso.mhi))
```
